mapper.select:
SELECT A AS ST_TIME, IFNULL(B.R, 0) RATE, IFNULL(B.r_display1, 0) DIS1, IFNULL(B.r_display2, 0) DIS2, IFNULL(B.r_display3, 0) DIS3, IFNULL(B.r_display4, 0) DIS4, IFNULL(B.r_display5, 0) DIS5, IFNULL(B.r_display6, 0) DIS6 FROM ( SELECT '00' a union all SELECT '01' a union all SELECT '02' a union all SELECT '03' a union all SELECT '04' a union all SELECT '05' a union all SELECT '06' a union all SELECT '07' a union all SELECT '08' a union all SELECT '09' a union all SELECT '10' a union all SELECT '11' a union all SELECT '12' a union all SELECT '13' a union all SELECT '14' a union all SELECT '15' a union all SELECT '16' a union all SELECT '17' a union all SELECT '18' a union all SELECT '19' a union all SELECT '20' a union all SELECT '21' a union all SELECT '22' a union all SELECT '23' ) TMP_TABLE
LEFT JOIN
( select st_time, ROUND( ( IFNULL(ROUND(r1/s1 * 100, 2), 0) + IFNULL(ROUND(r2/s2 * 100, 2), 0) + IFNULL(ROUND(r3/s3 * 100, 2), 0) + IFNULL(ROUND(r4/s4 * 100, 2), 0) + IFNULL(ROUND(r5/s5 * 100, 2), 0) + IFNULL(ROUND(r6/s6 * 100, 2), 0) )/6, 2 ) AS R,
CASE WHEN IFNULL(r1, 0) != 0 and IFNULL(r1, 0) = IFNULL(s1, 0) THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS r_display1, CASE WHEN IFNULL(r2, 0) != 0 and IFNULL(r2, 0) = IFNULL(s2, 0) THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS r_display2, CASE WHEN IFNULL(r3, 0) != 0 and IFNULL(r3, 0) = IFNULL(s3, 0) THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS r_display3, CASE WHEN IFNULL(r4, 0) != 0 and IFNULL(r4, 0) = IFNULL(s4, 0) THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS r_display4, CASE WHEN IFNULL(r5, 0) != 0 and IFNULL(r5, 0) = IFNULL(s5, 0) THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS r_display5, CASE WHEN IFNULL(r6, 0) != 0 and IFNULL(r6, 0) = IFNULL(s6, 0) THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS r_display6,
r1, r2, r3, r4, r5, r6, s1, s2, s3, s4, s5, s6, ROUND( ( ( (r1+r2+r3+r4+r5+r6) / (s1+s2+s3+s4+s5+s6) ) * 100) / 6, 2) as dd from ( select DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%H') st_time, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '00' AND '09'), (real_file_cnt), 0)) r1, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '10' AND '19'), (real_file_cnt), 0)) r2, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '20' AND '29'), (real_file_cnt), 0)) r3, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '30' AND '39'), (real_file_cnt), 0)) r4, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '40' AND '49'), (real_file_cnt), 0)) r5, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '50' AND '59'), (real_file_cnt), 0)) r6,
SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '00' AND '09'), (srv_file_cnt), 0)) s1, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '10' AND '19'), (srv_file_cnt), 0)) s2, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '20' AND '29'), (srv_file_cnt), 0)) s3, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '30' AND '39'), (srv_file_cnt), 0)) s4, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '40' AND '49'), (srv_file_cnt), 0)) s5, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '50' AND '59'), (srv_file_cnt), 0)) s6
from t_rcv_file WHERE DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{s_date} AND S_CODE = #{s_code} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H') ) STS_TABLE ) B ON TMP_TABLE.A = B.ST_TIME

SELECT ST_DAY, H_TIME, ROUND( ( IFNULL(ROUND(r1/s1 * 100, 2), 0) + IFNULL(ROUND(r2/s2 * 100, 2), 0) + IFNULL(ROUND(r3/s3 * 100, 2), 0) + IFNULL(ROUND(r4/s4 * 100, 2), 0) + IFNULL(ROUND(r5/s5 * 100, 2), 0) + IFNULL(ROUND(r6/s6 * 100, 2), 0) )/6, 2 ) AS RATE FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS ST_DAY, DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%H') h_time, DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H') AS ST_TIME, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '00' AND '09'), (real_file_cnt), 0)) r1, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '10' AND '19'), (real_file_cnt), 0)) r2, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '20' AND '29'), (real_file_cnt), 0)) r3, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '30' AND '39'), (real_file_cnt), 0)) r4, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '40' AND '49'), (real_file_cnt), 0)) r5, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '50' AND '59'), (real_file_cnt), 0)) r6, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '00' AND '09'), (srv_file_cnt), 0)) s1, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '10' AND '19'), (srv_file_cnt), 0)) s2, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '20' AND '29'), (srv_file_cnt), 0)) s3, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '30' AND '39'), (srv_file_cnt), 0)) s4, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '40' AND '49'), (srv_file_cnt), 0)) s5, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '50' AND '59'), (srv_file_cnt), 0)) s6 FROM T_RCV_FILE WHERE DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%Y-%m') = #{s_date} AND S_CODE = #{s_code} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H') ) TST ORDER BY ST_DAY, H_TIME
SELECT NO, S_CODE, S_YEAR, S_MON, S_DAY, S_HOUR, S_MIN, S_SEC, FILE_CNT, USE_CHK, REG_DT, UPT_DT FROM T_RCV_INFO ORDER BY REG_DT ASC
SELECT ID, NAME, PASS, EMAIL, AUTH_CHK, LAST_DT, REG_DT FROM T_USR_INFO ORDER BY REG_DT ASC
SELECT ID, NAME, PASS, EMAIL, AUTH_CHK, LAST_DT, REG_DT FROM T_USR_INFO WHERE ID=#{IDX}
mapper.update: UPDATE T_USR_INFO SET LAST_DT = current_timestamp WHERE ID = #{_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_USR_INFO ( ID, NAME, PASS, EMAIL, AUTH_CHK, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{pass}, #{email}, #{auth_chk}, current_timestamp )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_USR_INFO SET NAME = #{name} , PASS = #{pass} , EMAIL = #{email} , AUTH_CHK = #{auth_chk} WHERE ID = #{IDX}
mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME, PASS, EMAIL, AUTH_CHK, DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(LAST_DT, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') LAST_DT, REG_DT FROM T_USR_INFO WHERE ID = #{id} AND PASS = #{pass}

SELECT T1.S_CODE, T1.S_NAME, T1.ST_TIME, T1.P_TYPE, T1.PAM1, T1.PAM2, T1.PAM3, T1.PAM4, T1.PAM5, T1.STS AS PRO_STS, IFNULL(FILE_RCV_DT, '') FILE_RCV_DT, IFNULL(FILE_RCV_STS, 0) FILE_RCV_STS FROM ( SELECT TMP1.S_CODE, TMP1.S_NAME, IFNULL(TMP2.ST_TIME, '') ST_TIME, IFNULL(TMP2.P_TYPE, '') P_TYPE, IFNULL(TMP2.P_PAM1, '') PAM1, IFNULL(TMP2.P_PAM2, '') PAM2, IFNULL(TMP2.P_PAM3, '') PAM3, IFNULL(TMP2.P_PAM4, '') PAM4, IFNULL(TMP2.AVT_TM, '') PAM5, IFNULL(TMP1.S_STS, 0) STS, TMP1.REG_DT AS RCV_DT FROM ( SELECT A.S_CODE, A.S_NAME, A.S_STS, A.REG_DT FROM ( SELECT C.S_CODE, C.S_NAME, B.S_STS, B.REG_DT FROM T_ST_CODE C LEFT JOIN T_CLI_STS_INFO B ON C.S_CODE = B.S_CODE ) AS A WHERE A.S_CODE = #{s_code} ) TMP1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT S_CODE, ST_TIME, P_TYPE, P_PAM1, P_PAM2, P_PAM3, P_PAM4, AVT_TM FROM T_RCV_PARAM_INFO WHERE S_CODE = #{s_code} ORDER BY NO DESC LIMIT 0, 1 ) TMP2 ON ( TMP1.S_CODE = TMP2.S_CODE) ) T1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT S_CODE, REG_DT AS FILE_RCV_DT, IF(NOW() > ADDDATE(REG_DT, INTERVAL 30 MINUTE), 0, 1) AS FILE_RCV_STS FROM T_RCV_FILE WHERE S_CODE = #{s_code} ORDER BY NO DESC LIMIT 0, 1 ) T2 ON T1.S_CODE = T2.S_CODE
SELECT B.S_NAME, B.S_CODE, A.ST_TIME, A.CONTENT FROM T_RCV_ALM_INFO A, T_ST_CODE B WHERE A.S_CODE = #{s_code} AND A.S_CODE = B.S_CODE LIMIT 0, 1

SELECT A.S_CODE, case when IFNULL(B.RCV_RATE, 0) > 100.0 then 100.0 else IFNULL(B.RCV_RATE, 0) end RCV_RATE FROM T_ST_CODE A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT S_CODE, ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(RATE, 0))/(date_format(now(), '%H')), 0), 0) AS RCV_RATE FROM ( SELECT S_CODE, H_TIME, ROUND( ( IFNULL(ROUND(r1/s1 * 100, 2), 0) + IFNULL(ROUND(r2/s2 * 100, 2), 0) + IFNULL(ROUND(r3/s3 * 100, 2), 0) + IFNULL(ROUND(r4/s4 * 100, 2), 0) + IFNULL(ROUND(r5/s5 * 100, 2), 0) + IFNULL(ROUND(r6/s6 * 100, 2), 0) )/6, 2 ) AS RATE FROM ( SELECT S_CODE, DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS ST_DAY, DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%H') h_time, DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H') AS ST_TIME, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '00' AND '09'), (real_file_cnt), 0)) r1, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '10' AND '19'), (real_file_cnt), 0)) r2, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '20' AND '29'), (real_file_cnt), 0)) r3, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '30' AND '39'), (real_file_cnt), 0)) r4, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '40' AND '49'), (real_file_cnt), 0)) r5, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '50' AND '59'), (real_file_cnt), 0)) r6, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '00' AND '09'), (srv_file_cnt), 0)) s1, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '10' AND '19'), (srv_file_cnt), 0)) s2, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '20' AND '29'), (srv_file_cnt), 0)) s3, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '30' AND '39'), (srv_file_cnt), 0)) s4, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '40' AND '49'), (srv_file_cnt), 0)) s5, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '50' AND '59'), (srv_file_cnt), 0)) s6 FROM T_RCV_FILE WHERE DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{s_date} GROUP BY S_CODE, DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H') ) TST ORDER BY H_TIME ) TMP GROUP BY S_CODE ) B ON A.S_CODE = B.S_CODE ORDER BY A.S_CODE DESC

SELECT A.S_CODE, IFNULL(B.RCV_RATE, 0) RCV_RATE FROM T_ST_CODE A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT S_CODE, ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(RATE, 0))/24, 0), 0) AS RCV_RATE FROM ( SELECT S_CODE, H_TIME, ROUND( ( IFNULL(ROUND(r1/s1 * 100, 2), 0) + IFNULL(ROUND(r2/s2 * 100, 2), 0) + IFNULL(ROUND(r3/s3 * 100, 2), 0) + IFNULL(ROUND(r4/s4 * 100, 2), 0) + IFNULL(ROUND(r5/s5 * 100, 2), 0) + IFNULL(ROUND(r6/s6 * 100, 2), 0) )/6, 2 ) AS RATE FROM ( SELECT S_CODE, DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS ST_DAY, DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%H') h_time, DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H') AS ST_TIME, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '00' AND '09'), (real_file_cnt), 0)) r1, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '10' AND '19'), (real_file_cnt), 0)) r2, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '20' AND '29'), (real_file_cnt), 0)) r3, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '30' AND '39'), (real_file_cnt), 0)) r4, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '40' AND '49'), (real_file_cnt), 0)) r5, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '50' AND '59'), (real_file_cnt), 0)) r6, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '00' AND '09'), (srv_file_cnt), 0)) s1, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '10' AND '19'), (srv_file_cnt), 0)) s2, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '20' AND '29'), (srv_file_cnt), 0)) s3, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '30' AND '39'), (srv_file_cnt), 0)) s4, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '40' AND '49'), (srv_file_cnt), 0)) s5, SUM(IF ( (DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%i') BETWEEN '50' AND '59'), (srv_file_cnt), 0)) s6 FROM T_RCV_FILE WHERE DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{s_date} GROUP BY S_CODE, DATE_FORMAT(st_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H') ) TST ORDER BY H_TIME ) TMP GROUP BY S_CODE ) B ON A.S_CODE = B.S_CODE ORDER BY A.S_CODE DESC
